name: OCKTaskStoreDelegate
desc: An object that receives change callbacks from task stores.

items.name: func taskStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyTaskStore, didAddTasks: [OCKAnyTask])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you add tasks to the store.

items.name: func taskStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyTaskStore, didUpdateTasks: [OCKAnyTask])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you update tasks in the store.

items.name: func taskStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyTaskStore, didDeleteTasks: [OCKAnyTask])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you delete tasks from the store.
